indonesian_text: Kami punya 29 titik monitoring - 5 di danau, 24 di sungai upstream
english_translation: We have 29 monitoring points - 5 in the lake, 24 in upstream rivers

context: Community perspective on coordination meetings that produce no visible implementation

indonesian_text: SIMOLEK dikembangkan tahun 2023 oleh UGM, tapi sekarang statusnya tidak jelas
english_translation: SIMOLEK was developed in 2023 by UGM, but now its status is unclear
context: Describing the orphaned SIMOLEK system after BPDAS reorganization

indonesian_text: Kami tidak dikonsultasikan dalam penetapan batas danau. Tiba-tiba lahan kami masuk kawasan danau
english_translation: We were not consulted in the lake boundary determination. Suddenly our land became part of the lake area
context: Forum Petani chairman describing procedural exclusion from Kepmen 365 boundary expansion process

indonesian_text: BPN tidak termasuk dalam struktur Pokja, padahal mereka yang pegang data lahan
english_translation: BPN is not included in the Pokja structure, even though they hold the land data
context: Pokja Secretary identifying critical exclusion of National Land Agency from coordination

indonesian_text: Monitoring kualitas air kami lakukan dua kali setahun. Status danau adalah hipereutrofik
english_translation: We conduct water quality monitoring twice a year. The lake status is hypereutrophic
context: DLH Provinsi describing monitoring frequency and water quality findings

indonesian_text: Sedimentasi dari Sungai Parat paling tinggi. Total akumulasi sedimen mencapai 48 juta meter kubik
english_translation: Sedimentation from Sungai Parat is highest. Total sediment accumulation reaches 48 million cubic meters
context: BWS describing sediment sources and volumes

indonesian_text: Enceng gondok sudah mencapai 280 hektar. Kami ada kontrak 156 miliar dengan Kodam untuk pembersihan
english_translation: Water hyacinth has reached 280 hectares. We have a 156 billion contract with Kodam for removal
context: BWS describing water hyacinth extent and military removal contract

indonesian_text: 156 miliar untuk TNI, tapi kompensasi untuk petani nol. Kami dilarang bertani 2,5 tahun tanpa ganti rugi
english_translation: 156 billion for the military, but compensation for farmers is zero. We were banned from farming for 2.5 years without compensation
context: Forum Petani chairman highlighting budget asymmetry and zero compensation policy

indonesian_text: Jaman Belanda ada kesepakatan 6 bulan tutup, 6 bulan buka. Sekarang aturannya berubah terus
english_translation: During Dutch era there was agreement - 6 months closed, 6 months open. Now the rules keep changing
context: Community elder describing historical water access agreements and regulatory instability
